name: Watcher Of The Abyss
description:
One day, a mysterious abyssal vortex suddenly appeared in the world, and countless monsters crawled out of the abyss, intent on destroying this world. Choose your warriors to guard the abyss, prevent the abyss's expansion, defeat countless enemies, conquer the Boss, and defend our homeland.
Defeat enemies to gain experience and level up, choose your character's enhancement path. Collect tokens dropped by enemies, visit the shop, buy nodes, equip nodes, and adjust their positions to customize your bullet attack effects.
Strategically place nodes to reach the most powerful state.
